attributes.action: Queen To Name Prince William As Next In Line To Throne.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prince Charles had similar dilemmas as Prince Edward, and the latter chose the honourable course.

Prince Charles has been unable to put God and Country first and is unworthy of such high office.

Defender of The Faith and Leader of the Church of England is the remit of our Monarch. He should be acceptable to god and, have lived, lives, within the rules of the Church of England.

The Prime Minister should instruct the Queen to announce Prince William be next in line to the throne.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
